reference.shortdesc:
The condition element describes a state that the troubleshooting topic is intended to remedy. This information helps the user decide whether a troubleshooting topic might contain an applicable remedy for a problem. This section should add to or clarify information that is in the tile or short description of the troubleshooting topic. This information should be brief.Nancy's comment during the phase 1 review:Why should this piece of information be brief? If the condition is complex, it might not be possible or advisable to make it brief.
Leaving it to the technical committee to change, if needed, but wonder if it might be appropriate to change the last sentence to "This information should be brief; if it is not possible to make the information brief, this may be a sign that a full troubleshooting topic is needed."
